channel.title: Making a fishing spot
channel.description: I want to make like 4 Fishing spots in lumby castle court yard....could some one please tell me how to put them in and make it so they give different fish and need certain lvls for it?

item.title: Making a fishing spot
item.dc:creator: @Axiom_Owner Axiom Owner
item.description:
@Axiom_Owner wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Spawn it as an NPC in the autospawn configuration.
Declare it as a fishing spot using the object on object void.
Make it use fishing rod/nets > fishing spot = fishing void.[/quote]
maybe i wont have fishing in my server…lawl.

Read full topic
